Pathways to Better Outcomes

Polaris Pathways Behavioral Talent helps ABA clinics build stable, clinically aligned teams—and helps BCBAs and RBTs find careers where they can grow, stay, and thrive.

Know Who We Are

About our company

ABA work is a journey for clinics, for clinicians, and for the families they serve. Growth is rarely linear. Burnout is real. Hiring is hard. And finding the right fit can feel overwhelming on both sides.

Polaris Pathways Behavioral Talent exists to bring clarity, direction, and stability to that journey. We guide ABA clinics toward strong, sustainable teams. We guide BCBAs and RBTs toward careers where they can grow, stay, and thrive.

We believe when people feel supported and aligned, better outcomes follow.

Why Us

Why Polaris Is Different

Clinical-first vetting

with BCBA advisor oversight

Recruiters trained in ABA

language, ethics, and red flags

Focus on retention and alignment

not just speed

Career-path thinking

for clinicians

Growth-path thinking

for clinics

Human-first philosophy

grounded in real outcomes

The Polaris Pillars

Guided Careers

We help clinicians move forward with clarity, confidence, and long-term growth never just a quick placement.

Stable Teams

We help clinics reduce burnout, turnover, and disruption with clinically aligned, culture-fit staffing.

Better Outcomes

When teams are stable and people are well placed, children progress, families trust, and organizations thrive.

The Process

How It Works

A clear pathway forward for ABA professionals and the clinics that need them

For ABA Professionals

01

Apply & Get Guided

Complete your profile and share your career goals with our team.

02

Get Matched with Intention

We find opportunities aligned with your values, lifestyle, and long-term growth.

03

Grow in Your Career

Begin working with clinics that support your professional development and well-being.

For ABA Clinics

01

Share Your Needs

Tell us your staffing requirements, culture, and clinical approach.

02

Receive Vetted Candidates

Get clinically aligned, culture-fit matches who align with your mission.

03

Build a Stable Team

Focus on outcomes while we handle sustainable staffing solutions.

Connect with Us

For ABA Clinics

Build a Team That Stays. Serve Families with Confidence.

Polaris Pathways partners with ABA providers to deliver clinically vetted BCBAs and RBTs who align with your mission, your culture, and your standards. We focus on sustainable growth not just filling shifts so your organization can serve families with consistency and confidence.

  • Clinically guided vetting
  • Culture-fit placements
  • Faster hiring without sacrificing quality
  • Lower turnover and burnout
  • Scalable recruiting support
Request ABA Talent

For ABA Professionals

Find a Career That Fits Your Life Not Just Your License.

Your career deserves intention, not urgency. Polaris Pathways helps BCBAs and RBTs find roles aligned with their values, lifestyles, and long-term goals. We advocate for you, guide your next move, and help you grow without burning out.

  • Ethical, career-aligned placements
  • Caseload and environment matching
  • Growth-focused opportunities
  • Support beyond the offer letter
  • Respect for the emotional weight of your work
